title: Video Editing Postprod
description: Introduction to Editing and Post Production develops the skills and knowledge of digital film post-production, concentrating on editing, editing theory, narrative editing, and post-production workflow.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: LMC 2500 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (LMC 3254 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or LMC 3406 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
